OOC: How about this, Airly were you offended?  If she
was then I'll apologize, if not than everyone else
should apologize for flaming me and filling the board
with all these OOCs.
And I don't see women as "just" sexual objects, that
would be rude, and anti-Christian (please don't start
a big debate because I used that word).  I currently
have a crush on a mediocre looking girl (face and body
wise) because she's polite to me and we have common
interests.  Actually, I have no intention of EVER
letting her know I like her because she's one of my
few friends and I'm worried I'd embarrase her, or
annoy her and she'd get angry and say something rude,
and I'd get angry and say something rude back, and
we'd end up hating each other (exactly what's happened
with every girl I've ever liked, so not this one).

--- Eric Bischoff <1641coburn@...> wrote:
> OOC:  Kyle, I'm going to have to teach you a lesson
> little boy.  First of all, your name isn't Kyle, and
> I refuse to call you that from now on.  Second of
> all, about your intelligence.  Being intelligent is
> only good in a very little way.  You can have the
> highest IQ in all of damned history, yet it's still
> nothing without WISDOM.  You lack wisdom, and
> therefore your intelligence is a joke.
> 
> Second of all, I am not weird if I don't see women
> as nothing more than mere sexual objects.  I don't
> want to have children or marry somebody.  I
> extremely LOVE being alone, and I plan to be alone
> all of my life.  If I EVER want to have somebody
> there for me, it might as well be the VERY few
> friends I have.  Let's just say I have a lot less
> than 5 friends.  True friends, anyway.  Even if I
> haven't seen them.  Hehe.  Anyway, if all you think
> about in a woman is bed, why don't you go watch XPW
> or something.
> 
> Pooboy, the way you suggested to Airly wasn't
> polite, all it displayed was ignorance and
> self-absorbsion.  So get lost.  FEAR THE nWo!
>
